insight_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
trick_description: When you TRICK, you use deceit to and misdirection.
autofill_reminder_cell: To generate cell abilities, upgrades, contacts, and claims, enter the name of the cell type above:
autofill_reminder_playbook: To generate playbook abilities, items, and friends, enter the name of the playbook above:
consort_description: When you CONSORT, you socialize with friends and contacts and form emotional bonds.
chat_image: Image to show alongside chat rolls
dream_description: When you DREAM, you open your mind to the River of Dream and the spirit realm.
influence_description: When you INFLUENCE, you sway people with charm, logic, intimidation, threats, or force or personality.
trait_skeptic_description: Gain a new XP trigger - When you take a devil's bargain representing your doubts about the outcome, mark 1 XP.
trait_free_thinker_description: Gain a new XP trigger - When you do something to assert your or someone else's freedom regardless of consequences, mark an XP.
trait_anarchic_description: Gain potency when acting in direct opposition to authority.
trait_protective_description: Gain a new XP trigger - When you act to protect someone or something you believe in, mark an XP.
trait_manipulator_description: Gain a new XP trigger - When you steer events toward your goal without others realizing, mark an XP.
trait_motivator_description: Potency when leading a group action.
cell_upgrade_barber_description: The owner of Junks, a tavern and inn on Hom. He takes in nearly every newly Fallen, asking only that they return some favor to him in payment.
cell_upgrade_kymber_description: A prominent Lightbringer, who works to try to unify the Fallen and move them toward self-reliance. She settles many disputes, but often avoids conflict even when it is detrimental to herself or others.
cell_upgrade_kyrt_description: A popular Herite leader, known for advocating that the Fallen must take the fight to the Tribes if they are to survive.
cell_upgrade_mek_description: Considered to be the founder, and leader, of the Jackers, Mek is known for his unshakable sense of honor and his peerless martial skills.
cell_upgrade_veruka_description: She is the best known and considered wisest of the Doomsayers.
cell_demagogues_xp_condition: You appeal to the lowest common denominator or popular opinion, exploit prejudice, or create divisiveness.
cell_ability_for_the_people_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Consort, Influence, or Trick (up to a maximum of +3).
cell_ability_agitator_description: Each PC gains an additional diversion: Propaganda. When you indulge this diversion and spend time demonstrating or rallying, you don't overindulge if you clear excess stress.
cell_ability_scratch_my_back_description: Your populist agenda particularly helps out one faction. Whenever you gain favor with them, gain +1 favor.
cell_ability_connected_description: You know who is who and what is what. You take -1 notoriety during downtime and +1d to gather info on other factions.
cell_ability_incitement_description: Your cohorts have completely bought your rhetoric and propaganda, and will undertake any order you give them, no matter how dangerous. They gain +1d to rolls against those who oppose your Cell.
cell_ability_populist_description: When your Cell performs actions that align with a faction’s goals, you advance their goal clock twice as many ticks. Which faction do you align so strongly with? Why do your actions help them more than others?
cell_ability_sticks_and_stones_descripti: The cell is especially adept at withstanding criticism from others. Gain +1d to your resolve resistance rolls.
cell_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another Cell.
cell_upgrade_altara_description: A Lightbringer determined to unite the Fallen. Altara is currently writing a Fallen manifesto.
cell_upgrade_aramis_description: A charismatic and seemingly sympathetic Judge who is willing to work with the Fallen in exchange for favors.
cell_upgrade_benjamin_description: The leader of the remote Evan community of Griffentowne.
cell_upgrade_hal_description: A charismatic and populist leader who is willing to do what it takes to forge the Fallen into a power within their own right - with himself at the top, of course.
cell_upgrade_troy_description: A fanatical and violent killer who refers to the Fatimas as the Seven Deaths. She stalks and assassinates prominent Tribals.
cell_firebrands_description_xp_condition: You protect the downtrodden, disrupt the status quo, fight against oppression, or spread chaos for chaos' sake.
cell_ability_spitfires_description: Each Cell member may add +1 action rating to Fight, Force, or Hunt (up to a max rating of 3).
cell_ability_bad_apples_description: When you act alongside your cohorts to cause trouble, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group actions). All of your cohorts get the Raiders type for free (if they're already Raiders, add another type).
cell_ability_instigators_description: If you leave a calling card or highly visible symbol of resistance on your quest, gain +2 Notoriety. Your crew gains +1d to Diversion during the next downtime, and cannot overindulge.
cell_ability_just_cause_description: When your crew does the right thing at cost to themselves, you may mark 1 crew xp.
cell_ability_dogged_description: Members of this cell never back down in the face of violence or force, gaining +1d to prowess resistance.
cell_ability_comrades_description: During downtime, one of your contacts or experts may take a downtime action to acquire an asset, reduce Notoriety, or recover harm for you.
cell_ability_sympathizers_description: Your revolution or cause is especially appealing. When you deal with a cell or faction, the GM will tell you who among them believes in your cause (one, a few, many, or all).
cell_upgrade_deus_description: A former Magdalite, Deus chooses to spread his message by leaving his writings all over the walls of Hom and Vimary.
cell_upgrade_baal_description: He is a violent and vengeful ex-Magdalite. Baal's cell, the Furies, revels in causing havoc and destruction among the Tribals.
cell_upgrade_alexis_description: Once a Magdalite Concubine, Alexis craves excitement and adventure, often venturing into the Outlands or even Hl'kar to explore or discover new things.
cell_upgrade_john_description: A charismatic leader, John has been preparing for and advocating war against the Tribes. He is accumulating the arsenal and followers to try to make it a reality.
cell_upgrade_evangel_description: A former Joanite, Evangel prefers fighting with words instead of swords. She is working to find out what the Tera Sheban judge Cylix Seth'on is planning.
cell_visionaries_xp_condition: you build or create something, solve a mystery, or discover something.
cell_ability_prescience_description: Each cell member may add +1 action rating to Craft, Dream, or Study (up to a maximum of 3).
cell_ability_backer_description: You have a patron faction who supports your endeavors. You gain +1 barter with that faction.
cell_ability_collaboration_description: During downtime, one of your cohorts may perform a downtime activity for the crew to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or work on a long-term project.
cell_ability_daydream_believers_descript: Your Cell gains +1d when you dream to gather information. When undertaking a quest cautiously or elaborately, gain +1d on the engagement roll.
cell_ability_focused_description: When members of your Cell pursue long term projects that are 8 segments or larger, they gain +1d on the action roll to tick the goal clock.
cell_ability_servants_of_the_goddess_des: The cell has an uncanny ability to make friends in the strangest places. Each member has an extra contact from either their playbook or Cell contact list.
cell_upgrade_den_hades_description: Halos' lover, she speaks prophecy to anyone who will listen. She also takes in newly Fallen to teach them about the River of Dream, although her manner is very rough and crude with her students.
cell_upgrade_kara_description: A former Joanite and cousin to a prominent Joanite holy warrior, Kara's cell The Seeds of Eden draws from all four Outlooks.
cell_upgrade_jonhur_description: Jonhur is zealous about Joshua's prophecy, and believes he has seen visions and omens portending Joshua's imminent return.
cell_upgrade_acturius_description: Barely more than a child, Acturius spends a lot of time on Hom, learning about the Fallen and by extension the Tribes.
cell_upgrade_tera_description: Tera is a compassionate and driven individual who makes monthly journeys to Hom to tend to the sick and injured. She is friends with Kymber Reva.
fill_fields: Fill in sheet fields automatically upon entering or changing playbook or cell type
finesse_description: When you FINESSE, you employ dextrous manipulation or subtle misdirection.
flexible_width: Flexible character sheet width (adapts to container)
gatherinfo_what_might_I_suspect:
What might I suspect about this?
What can I prove?
gatherinfo_detail_for_plan: Ask about a detail for a plan.
survey_description: When you SURVEY, you observe the situation and anticipate outcomes..
list_cells: Demagogues, Firebrands, Visionaries, Rangers, or Silvers
list_playbooks: Agnite, Dahlian, Evan, Joanite, Magdalite, Terasheban, or Yagan
name: Name and Pronouns
planningdesc: Choose a plan, provide the detail. Choose your load limit for the operation.
playbook_ability_awakened_dreamer_descri: You can use Eminence and gain one Eminence use. Take this ability again to add additional uses.
playbook_ability_seasoned_description: Choose a special ability from another source.
playbook_ability_synthesis_description: You can change reality with a magnitude lower than Resolve+Vision. Mark an Eminence use, take stress for the difference between magnitude and Resolve, and roll dice equal to Synthesis rating. Synthesis can be taken multiple times.
playbook_ability_angelic_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a social consequence, or to push yourself when maintaining your innocence.
playbook_ability_bounces_back_descriptio: You mark one extra tick of harm when recuperating.
playbook_ability_only_a_child_descriptio: When someone suffers harm protecting you, they mark xp.
playbook_ability_playful_description: Once per quest when your Cell isn't in danger, you can tell jokes, play games, and lighten the mood, clearing 1 stress for everyone present.
playbook_ability_sneaky_description: When you gather information to find out a secret, you have +1 effect. When you find and prepare a place to hide, you get +1d to rolls to avoid being found.
playbook_ability_underfoot_description: You always move first (if they have Underfoot, you both move simultaneously). Also take +1d to resist attacks with prowess.
playbook_ability_hide_n_seek_description: Spend 2 stress to become invisible. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_luck_description: Spend 1 stress to treat 5s as 6s on an action. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_naivete_description: Spend 2 stress fopr a target to take to -1d to resolve resist. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_wonder_description: Take 1 Stress to animate objects. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_jack_of_all_trades_desc: Take 1 stress to roll +1d on an action you have no dots in..
playbook_ability_behind_the_mask_descrip: When you lead a group action, you have +1 or -1 scale, your choice. The leader of a group action doesn’t take stress on your behalf if you participate and fail the roll (even if it’s you).
playbook_ability_guile_description: You can expend your special armor to resist a complication from being deceived, or push yourself to deceive someone.
playbook_ability_mirror_mirror_descripti: You can always tell when you're being lied to.
playbook_ability_trade_network_descripti: During downtime you get +1 potency when rolling to acquire an asset or supplies.
playbook_ability_worldly_description: You feel comfortable with and are well versed in the other Tribes and cultures. Gain potency when you try to influence or consort with them.
playbook_ability_dahlias_doorway_descrip: Create an opening in a solid object. Spend 1 Stress for large large enough to pass your hand through; 2 to crawl into; 3 to walk through; and 4 to drive a wagon through.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_dance_of_masks_descript: Spend 1 Stress to take on the appearance of the last person you touched. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_metamorphosis_descripti: Spend 1 Stress to change an object's appearance only, spend another to change its function. The object reverts at the end of the scene. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_puppet_show_description: Spend 2 Stress to inflict waking nightmares on a target for the scene. They are at -1d to perform any action. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_natures_bond_descriptio: Expend your special armor to resist harm resulting from a natural setting or to push yourself when moving through it.
playbook_ability_comfort_food_descriptio: Once per quest, equip fresh food to cook a hearty Evan meal. Everyone who partakes clears 1 stress.
playbook_ability_healer_description: Expend one medicine use to remove level 1 harm from an ally.
playbook_ability_mother_bear_description: You can push yourself to  ignore all harm penalties. Take +1d to resist the consequence of any roll you pushed yourself on.
playbook_ability_robust_description: When you take level 1 harm, clear 1 stress. Place a free check when healing.
playbook_ability_stalwart_description: When you protect an ally, resist with +1d. When you assist someone, their pushes cost only 1 stress.
playbook_ability_zbri_hunter_description: Your hunting companion gains potency when hunting or tracking Z'bri. Choose one spirit ability: dream-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift.
playbook_ability_anima_description: Spend 1 Stress to mark a tick on another's healing clock. Mark 2 Stress to reduce a character's level 4 harm to level 3. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_piggyback_description: Spend 1 Stress to call a spirit. Influence it to have it  take you into the River of Dream. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_smothering_description: Touch an opponent to spend 2 Stress to cause 1 harm. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_master_at_arms_descript: When you push yourself while using fight, you gain potency.
playbook_ability_archer_description: Push yourself to do one of the following: make an extremely difficult shot such as a fast moving or very small target - provide covering fire so your allies can advance/withdraw.
playbook_ability_bastion_description: You can expend your special armor against a consequence to a teammate you are protecting.
playbook_ability_cavalry_description: Potency when fighting from horseback. When you push yourself while on horseback, it only costs 1 stress.
playbook_ability_hard_to_kill_descriptio: Penalties from harm are reduced one level. Level 4 harm is still fatal.
playbook_ability_virtuous_description: You and all of your allies within line of sight gain +1d resist to fear and corruption.
playbook_ability_battle_description: Spend 1 Stress to do one of the following: perform a physical feat that verges on the superhuman - reduce the threat level of every enemy you're facing by 1.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_righteousness_descripti: Spend 1 Stress for you and all of your allies to gain potency on any rolls against Z'bri and +1d resist against Z'bri for the scene. Using Righteousness ends any Synthesis or Aspect effect, and using any Synthesis or Aspect ends Righteousness. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_sacrifice_description: When you protect an ally, spend 1 Stress for +2d resist. If you take harm as a result, all allies clear 1 stress.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_winters_cloak_descripti: Spend 1 Stress to ignore consequences resulting from travelling through ice and snow. +1d resist against cold.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_intimacy_description: You get +1d to consort with a target to gather information about a quest. You gain +1d on the engagement roll for that quest.
playbook_ability_apothecary_description: When you craft or create a drug, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one drug already known. Always equip drug satchel for 0 load.
playbook_ability_enchanting_description: When you consort with someone, you can make them forget about what happened for that time period.
playbook_ability_indulgent_description: When you indulge in your diversion, you can move the die result 1 or 2 in either direction. Anybody who indulges with you gains the benefit as well.
playbook_ability_maskers_dance_descripti: Push yourself to do one of the following: perform a near impossible feat of acrobatics or gymnastics  - weave and sway so that your opponents attack one another.
playbook_ability_pledge_description: When you swear an oath or pledge with another party - human or not - you both are marked and bound by that oath. If either of you breaks it, you take the level 3 harm “Cursed”.
playbook_ability_manifestation_descripti: Spend 1 Equilibrium to change your appearance for the scene. Gain potency when influencing others to convince them of your identity.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_nitrous_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to enter another's dream and interact with them. Spend 1 more Equilibrium to take control of the dream.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_passion_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to add +1d to an influence roll. The target is -1d to resist any consequences that arise from it, if applicable.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_treason_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to determine a weakness your target has - even one unknown to them. Increase position by 1 when using that weakness against them.  Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_mastermind_description: You may expend your special armor to protect a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
playbook_ability_connected_description: During downtime, you get +1 effect level when you acquire an asset or reduce notoriety.
playbook_ability_investigator_descriptio: During downtime, you receive two ticks to add to any investigative long term project clocks.
playbook_ability_meticulous_description: Because of your careful planning you can give yourself or a Cell member +1 downtime action.
playbook_ability_prescience_description: You can assist a teammate without paying stress two times per quest. How were you able to prepare?
playbook_ability_scholar_description: You have academic knowledge of Tribal lore and esoterica.You can read and write Tribal and Keepspeak. Gain +1d when gathering info through study and when resisting with insight.
playbook_ability_trailblazer_description: When you gather info on a location you’ve never visited before, you get +1 effect. If you encounter traps or other deadfalls, you get +1d to resist.
playbook_ability_tradition_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to learn the truth and past about an object, place, or person. Use this information to gain increased effect on rolls involving the subject. Requires Synthesis
playbook_ability_truthsaying_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to ask a subject a question that they must answer truthfully or be wracked with pain. If they refuse or lie, inflict 1 harm resisted by resolve. Requires Synthesis
playbook_ability_habeascorpus_descriptio: Spend 1 Equilibrium to use a dream flashback to retrace the steps that lead to a past event. Requires Synthesis
playbook_ability_mystic_description: You have an understanding of dreams and omens. When you gather info using ritual implements take +1d. You can push yourself to enter a dream trance even under chaotic/noisy circumstances.
playbook_ability_fleshcrafter_descriptio: You can use craft to mend wounds. You may study corpses to gather information. Everyone in your Cell gains +1d on healing rolls.
playbook_ability_fleshseer_description: You always know what the highest threat level of Z'bri is in the area. You can gather info on them with insight.
playbook_ability_masterbonecrafter_descr: When you craft or invent a bone item, take +1 result level to your roll. You start knowing how to craft one bone item.
playbook_ability_reaper_description: You know the secrets of poisons. Automatically equip a poison pouch for 0 load. You are immune to one poison of your choice, and can push yourself to use your poisons without being detected.
playbook_ability_secondsight_description: You are always aware of spirits in your presence. Take +1d when you gather information about the spirit world.
playbook_ability_spiritcaller_descriptio: You can talk to spirits as if they were living people, no matter how weak or inhuman they are. You gain potency when dealing with the supernatural.
playbook_ability_celticcross_description: Spend 1 Equilibrium to use ritual implements and survey to gather information about a subject. The information gathered will be about their past and secrets. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_curseofdream_descriptio: Spend 1 Equilibrium to inflict level 2 harm "Cursed". The target resists through resolve. Requires Synthesis.
playbook_ability_dreamtravel_description: When you push yourself to enter the River of Dream, do one of the following: enter the dream realm of another to gain information from them - possess a small animal. Your body is defenseless for the duration.  Requires Synthesisclever .
playbook_agnite_friend_2: Kyrt the Free, vivacious Herite leader.
playbook_agnite_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with playfulness or youthful exuberance.
playbook_dahlian_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with trickery or inventiveness.
playbook_evan_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with empathy or teamwork.
playbook_joanite_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with martial ability or force.
playbook_magdalite_friend_0: Alexis of Blade, an lluring Jacker.
playbook_magdalite_friend_1: Darius, a bouncer at Ile Purdue.
playbook_magdalite_friend_3: Eshlazi, a seductive Z'bri posing as a Magdalite.
playbook_magdalite_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with investigation, arcana, or passion.
playbook_Terasheban_friend_1: Emulaan the Poet, a Fallen historian
playbook_Terasheban_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with investigation or knowledge.
playbook_Yagan_friend_3: Madame Curie, a spiritual Keeper Ancient.
playbook_Yagan_friend_4: Veruka the Wraith, a frail Doomsayer leader.
playbook_Yagan_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with charmwork, wisdom, or care.
playbook_item_arts_and_crafts_descriptio: Chalk, paint, markers, and other odds and ends. What do you carry them in? What did you create with them last?
playbook_item_backpack_description: A backpack with plenty of room in it. When equipped you treat your load level as one lower.
playbook_item_candy_description: A bag of colorful candy. Is often useful for trading or lifting spirits.
playbook_item_fine_toy_description: An old toy, in amazingly good shape. Does it move, light up, or make noise? It might be useful for a distraction.
playbook_item_relic_gadget_description: A small relic tool. Choose one function: pocket flashlight—multitool—pocket knife. What did you use if for last?
playbook_item_concealed_weapon_descripti: A sword cane, telescoping baton, or hidden spring loaded weapon. Meant for self-defense, not pitched combat.
playbook_item_fine_costume_description: A set of clothes designed to make you look, and feel, like someone else. Is it colorful and flamboyant? Is it meant to portray a specific identity?
playbook_item_fine_disguise_kit_descript: Makeup sticks and powders, simple prosthetics, a wig. What have you disguised yourself as?
playbook_item_fine_lockpicks_description: A set of lockpicks suitable for even opening relic locks.
playbook_item_loaded_dice_description: Standard con artist tools. Good for magic tricks, swindling unwitting victims, and giving fake fortunes. Just don’t let the Watch (or the Yagans) catch you.
playbook_item_trinkets_description: Various small items, good for simple trades. Something in there might be useful in a pinch.
playbook_item_camo_gear_description: Hides, gillie suits, netting, tents, and bedrolls made to blend into the environment. Can be used to hide your entire cell.
playbook_item_hunting_companion_descript: A trained animal that obeys your commands and works with you as a partner. Expert: Hunter
playbook_item_eva_medallion_description: A small token that was once touched or blessed by Eva. A leaf that never withers, a small vial of water that never goes bad, etc.
playbook_item_medicine_satchel_descripti: Herbs, sutures, clean bandages, poultics, antiseptics and other supplies needed for treating wounds
playbook_item_fresh_food_description: Even to make a good meal for the entire Cell while on a quest. What is your signature dish?
playbook_item_farming_implements_descrip: A sickle or hatchet, hand plow, trowel, rake or scythe. A bag of seeds or basket for harvesting. The tools work as decent weapons in a pinch.
playbook_item_fine_hand_weapon_descripti: A well-crafted one-handed weapon made and balanced specifically for you.
playbook_item_fine_armor_description: Leather and chain armor reinforced with relic armor pieces and custom fitted to you.
playbook_item_fine_shield_description: Mostly or all metal shield, balanced for you.
playbook_item_fine_longbow_description: Made of high quality, polished wood. Accurate out to 150 yards.
playbook_item_metalworking_tools_descrip: Hammers, tongs, chisels, bits, nails, heavy apron and gloves. You can make simple repairs but need a forge and anvil to do anything more involved.
playbook_item_training_token_description: A tattoo, body modification, badge on your armor, or some other indicator of your martial training.
playbook_item_drug_satchel_description: Hide or canvas satchel with spaces for pouches, vials, or other containers of drug doses and implements for administering them. Slots for three doses.
playbook_item_fine_clothes_description: Made from sheerest silks, the most supple leathers, finest cloth, or even more exotic materials. They make you look good and attract attention.
playbook_item_luxury_item_description: An exotic or fine item - possibly relic - sure to impress. May be drink, food, fine cloth, high quality spices or drugs. Good for trading.
playbook_item_mask_description: An elaborate Magdalite mask. Good for performances, rituals, or just covering your face.
playbook_item_fine_musical_instrument_de: An exquisite, precisely tuned musical instrument.
playbook_item_small_concealed_weapon_des: A small easily concealed hand or throwing weapon such as a hairpin, buckle, necklace that doubles as a garrotte, etc.
playbook_item_books_and_journals_descrip: Historical books and documents, collections of documents about law, sheafs of maps (both new and old), useful for reference. The first of these costs 0 load; each successive book or journal adds +1 load.
playbook_item_notebooks_description: A few small notebooks and charcoal or other utensils to write with.
playbook_item_worn_book_description: A book, possibly relic, given to you by a favorite mentor.
playbook_item_light_exploration_gear_des: Light rope, pitons, mallet, small steel prybar, folding grapnel, and reusable light source.
playbook_item_fine_robes_description: Heavy duty, voluminous robe with a hood and plenty of pockets to hold objects.
playbook_item_lantern_staff_description: A sturdy staff with a lantern affixed to one end. Can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
playbook_item_fine_bone_item_description: A useful item such as a lantern made from a skull, ,
playbook_item_skin_book_description: A small vellum book where you record your cell's exploits and quests.
playbook_item_fine_ritual_implements_des: A fine silver bowl, quality incense, quicksilver, custom divinatory cards and dice, strong hallucinogens.
playbook_item_poison_satchel_description: Discreet bag with compartments for transporting poisons without being detected. Slots for three poisons.
playbook_item_fine_knife_description: A wickedly sharp, long knife with a bone handle. Perfectly balanced for throwing or precision slicing.
playbook_item_spirit_charms_description: A small collection of remains (teeth, a knucklebone, ashes) and other items useful in drawing or warding against spirits.
upgrade_bolthole_description: Your lair has secure, easy access to an underground network of tunnels that allows relatively safe travel between Hom and Vimary, with one hidden egress point. Taking this focus multiple times provides more exits.
upgrade_hidden_description: Your lair has a secret location and is disguised to hide it from view. If your lair is discovered, use two downtime activities and pay resources equal to your Tier to relocate it and hide it once again.
upgrade_infirmary_description: Your lair has space, equipment, and supplie to provide care for sick and wounded Cell members. Add your Sanctuary rating to treatment rolls.
upgrade_quarters_description: Your lair has a common space for your to cell to sleep, but this upgrade provides relatively more comfortable living arrangements with individual quarters, more amenities in your common area, and even space to put up others for a short time. Quarters reduces stress incurred during downtime activities by 1.
upgrade_ritual_space_description: Your lair has a dedicated space for doing ritual work, sheltered from distractions. Increases the magnitude of rituals by +1.
upgrade_secure_description: Your lair comes equipped with locks and alarms. A second upgrade improves the reinforcement of the lair and provides spiritual defenses to defend against Dreamers and Sundering.
upgrade_transport_description: Your lair comes with transport - a boat, wagon, horses, bicycles, or other conveyance - for a small group of people (about 6), and space to house and deploy. A second upgrade does one of the following: increase capacity (about 12)—motorized—more rugged/robust
upgrade_workshop_description: Your lair comes with benches, wood and metal working tools, and a forge. When making a crafting roll or working on a long term project, add your Sanctuary rating.
upgrade_armor_quality_description: Improves the quality of armor (including shields) by +1.
upgrade_armor_load_description: Provides 2 free load of armor (including shields).
upgrade_documents_quality_description: Improves the quality of documents and maps by +1
upgrade_gear_quality_description: Improves the quality of exploration, hunting, survival gear, and winter clothes by +1.
upgrade_implements_quality_description: Improves the quality of ritual implements and medallions by +1.
upgrade_tools_quality_description: Improves the quality of crafting tools by +1.
upgrade_weapons_quality_description: Each upgrade improves the quality rating of all packs, which covers melee weapons, small arms, and heavy ordnance.
upgrade_ritual_synthesis_description: Your rituals can manifest a single Synthesis effect.
upgrade_aspect_description: You can perform an Aspect as a ritual.
upgrade_summoning_description: Your rituals can summon and speak with or bind a specific spirit.
upgrade_divination_description: Your rituals can manifest an omen, vision, or portent of the past, present, or future.
upgrade_protection_description: Your rituals can remove supernatural effects, banish spirits, or protect you against a specific danger or threat.
upgrade_old_arts_description: You can perform rituals that combine Synthesis and Sundering effects. This upgrade - and the accompanying rituals - must be granted from a boon.
upgrade_sundering_description: You can perform rituals that manifest a single Sundering effect. Performing these rituals is not without consequences, and taking this upgrade and the accompanying rituals must be granted from a boon.
upgrade_dream_description: You can perform rituals that allow you to interact with the River of Dream.
upgrade_nature_description: You can perform rituals that deal with the natural world, from plants and animals to natural forces such as the weather.
armor_description: Leather armor tunic with some additional reinforcement, pants with leg guards, boots and gloves, and possibly light headgear.
+heavy_description: Addition of a heavy helm, greaves, and metal or relic plates. The load for heavy armor is in addition to normal armor, for 3 load total.
bow_description: A simple straight bow or primitive crossbow, accurate to about 75 yards.
documents_description: Treatises on Outlander outposts, Dahlian caravan routes, Joanite patrols, the River of Dream. Charcoal and blank pages. Maps of Vimary and the nearby Outlands.
exploration_gear_description: Heavy rope, pitons, large mallet, pry bar, torches, a fire axe or machete.
hand_weapon_description: A knife, blade, axe, hammer, or similar weapon
hunting_gear_description: Nets, traps, snares, fishing pole and lines.
large_weapon_description: A large boar spear, pike, poleaxe, two handed axe, hammer, lance, or similar large weapon.
ritual_implements_description: A bowl, incense, chalk or charcoal, divinatory cards, dice, bones, mild hallucinogens. trance/concentration aids.
shield_description: Wood with metal reinforcement, or some relic materials. Good for blocking hand weapons.
shield_heavy_description: A larger shield, you can fully hide behind it by crouching slightly and it's more effective against longer weapons.
small_medallion_description: A small item blessed by a Fatima or another spirit. It weakly radiates Synthesis.
survival_gear_description: Bedroll, lean-to or shelter, flint and tinder, water skin, some rations,small knife, trowel.
thrown_weapon_description: A few throwing knives, a throwing hatchet, javelins, heavy sling, etc. Typically accurate out to 8 to 10 yards; most can also be used in melee.
unusual_weapon_description: A weapon improvised from a curiosity or tool. A whip, length of pipe or chain, baseball bat with blades or spikes, flail or mace, weighted net, etc.
winter_clothes_description: Will provide protection even in sub-freezing temperatures. Furs, with a hood, fur lined gloves and boots, face covering with eye protection, snow shoes.
prowess_description: Resist consequences from physical strain or injury.
lurk_description: When you LURK, you move skillfully and quietly.
query_for_consequence: Query for consequence name when resisting
recoveryblurb: Get treatment in downtime to activate your healing project clock
resist_instructions: Suffer 6 stress minus the highest die result. When you roll a critical on resistance, clear 1 stress.
resolve_description: Resist consequences from mental strain or willpower.
show_broadcast: Show broadcast buttons for sending information to chat
show_cohort_section: Show Expert section on character sheet
show_outline: Show outline for active input fields
fight_description: When you Fight, you engage a target in pitched, close combat.
craft_description: When you CRAFT, you build, modify, or repair devices, mechanisms, or other items.
study_description: When you STUDY, you scrutinize details and interpret evidence.
hunt_description: When you HUNT, you carefully track a target.
upgrade_insight_description: Earn 2 xp when training insight during downtime.
upgrade_mastery_description: Your cell has access to master level training. You may advance your PCs' action ratings to 4 (until you unlock this upgrade, PC action ratings are capped at 3). This costs four upgrade boxes to unlock.
upgrade_personal_description: Earn 2 xp when training playbook during downtime.
upgrade_prowess_description: Earn 2 xp when training prowess during downtime.
upgrade_resolve_description: Earn 2 xp when training resolve during downtime.
upon_cell_advance: Upon cell advance, each PC gets Stash = Tier+2
use_kirsty: Use Asap font if installed (only check if you have Asap)
vice_instructions: Clear an amount of stress equal to the highest die result. If the result of your unwind roll means you clear more stress levels than you had marked, you overindulge.
warblurb1: When you're at war with any number of factions (status -3), the following penalties apply:
warblurb2: Lose 1 hold (temporarily, while the war persists). This may knock you down a Tier.
warblurb3: PCs get only one free downtime action instead of two.
warblurb5: Your claims which generate coin (vice dens, fighting pits, fences, etc.) produce only half their normal income (round down).
when_you_use_bandolier: When you use a bandolier slot, choose an alchemical:
force_description: When you FORCE, you unleash savage force or exert tremendous strength.
xp_beliefs: You expressed your outlook, beliefs, drives, heritage, or background.
xp_bolster: Bolster your cell's reputation or develop a new one.
xp_contend: Contend with challenges above your current station.
xp_cell_specific: Enter your cell's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_desperate: Every time you roll a desperate action, mark xp in that action's attribute.
xp_express: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the cell.
xp_specific: Enter your playbook's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_specific_extra: Enter another specific way to mark XP here.
xp_top: At the end of each session, for each item below, mark 1 xp (or instead mark 2 xp if that item occurred multiple times).
xp_diversion: You struggled with issues from your diversion, traumas, or past crimes during the session.
zerodice: Zero Dice — take the lowest result above
